issue.description: NM_009286.1/Sult2a2 appears to be missing from build 37.
issue.resolution_text: NM_009286.1 (Sult2a2) GeneID 20865 has been merged into GeneID 100043194 which is located at NC_000073.5:14318855-14364986

issue.summary: Discrepancy (deletion) between genomic clone AC151839.2 and transcripts affecting gene translation
issue.description: The translation of the C2cd3 is affected by a discrepancy (deletion of an "A") between genomic clone AC151839.2 and transcripts.
issue.resolution_text: Changed switchpoints to include more of AC117215.3 and less of AC151839.2 in reference.

issue.summary: Discrepancy (insertion) between genomic clone AC107822.18 and transcripts affecting gene translation
issue.status_text: We will conduct PCR on C57BL/6J DNA
issue.description: The translation of the Kndc1 gene is affected by a discrepancy (insertion of a "C") between genomic clone AC107822.18 and transcripts.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: Discrepancy (mismatch) between genomic clone AC164564 and transcripts
issue.description: Discrepancy (mismatch) between genomic clone AC164564.3 and transcripts for the Rasgrp4 gene.
issue.resolution_text: Mouse Reference sequence seems to be correct.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site: suggests possible assembly error at gap
issue.description: User reports a possible assembly error in region surrounding assembly gap between NT_039413 and NT_039424 (AC149271.5 and AC129176.6).
issue.resolution_text: Components AC237159.3, AC238840.3 and AC147801.8 have been submitted and added to the TPF while AC238816.3 is still being sequenced and added to this gap. Further progress on this gap can be followed in JIRA tickets HG-4154 and HG-4155.

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between accessions AC132586.3 and AC130680.13.

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between accessions AC188462.2 and AC188464.2.
issue.resolution_text: This gap is now closed as it was over-expanded by 269kb in the NC_000073.6. GRCm38 components AC188462 and AC188464 have also been removed from the TPF as they are redundant.

issue.status_text: Current resources/technologies have been exhausted in attempting to close this gap

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between accessions AC130550.4 and AC174642.2

issue.description: WGS may be available to reduce a type-2 gap between TPF components AC132586.3 and AC130680.13
issue.resolution_text: Components AC220996.12, AC217111.9, AC240460.2 and AC242593.3 have been sequenced in order to replace WGS CAAA01201403 - CAAA01153584 in the region.

issue.status_text: Radioactive hybridization will be performed in an attempt to close this gap.

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between accessions AC122819.4 and AC167199.2.

issue.summary: Issue reported from Web Site (Ahsp missing from assembly)

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between accessions AC168073.4 and AC172750.1
issue.resolution_text: Component RP23-410L1 (AC221015.2) was added to the TPF since the release of MGSCv37. Work on this gap can now be followed in tickets MG-3941 and MG-4163.

issue.summary: Should Mm37 unlocalized contig NT_166308 be retained in future assemblies?
issue.description: Determine evidence for retaining NT_166308 in future assemblies.
issue.resolution_text: NT_166308.1/AC189028.2 was found to be mis-assembled, it will be removed from future mouse assemblies.

issue.summary: Possible single nucleotide error in Reference component CAAA01193828.1 (#1)
issue.description: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone CAAA01193828.1 (Build37 position 3415332)
issue.resolution_text: AC240460.2 will replace CAAA01193828.1 in Build38. It agrees with NM_133190.1 and fixes the previous error in the Reference component CAAA01193828.1(Build37 position 3415332) .

issue.summary: Possible single nucleotide error in Reference component CAAA01193828.1 (#2)
issue.description: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone CAAA01193828.1 (Build37 pos. 3415343)
issue.resolution_text: AC240460.2 will replace CAAA01193828.1 in Build38. It agrees with NM_133190.1 and fixes the previous error in the Reference component CAAA01193828.1(Build37 position 3415343) .

issue.summary: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AC102150.10.
issue.status_text: The reference sequence has been verified, but there is evidence of intra-strain variation. This issue will be re-visited when an SOP for investigation of mouse variation is developed.
issue.description: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AC102150.10. The Reference Sequence at position 63386662 of NC_000073.5 has been verified. Reported discrepancies at this site may reflect unrecognized variation or segmental duplication.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.summary: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AC110520.12.
issue.status_text: The reference sequence has been verified, but there is evidence of intra-strain variation. This issue will be re-visited when an SOP for investigation of mouse variation is developed.
issue.description: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone AC110520.12. The Reference Sequence at position 86256240 of NC_000073.5 has been verified. Reported discrepancies at this site may reflect unrecognized variation or segmental duplication.
issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: NM_030741.1 aligns to both AC102264.26 and AC161762.4, making one of the accessions possibly redundant.
issue.resolution_text: AC102264.26 is redundant. Will change the status of AC102264.26 to redundant on sequence curation page.

issue.summary: SNP analysis of the Mouse Genomes Project suggests a possible single nucleotide error in reference clone CAAA01221083.1

issue.status_text: Current technologies will not allow us to accurately determine the size of the Snord116 cluster due to an unresolved tandem repeat in the region

issue.resolution_text: na

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between accessions AC134573.5 and AC190408.1
issue.resolution_text: Gap has been closed due to re-arrangement of contigs in the region. AC134573.5 now has a green-ball join with re-arranged TPF component AC188456.2 which closes the gap.

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between accessions AC188465.2 and AC188462.2
issue.resolution_text: Gap has been closed due to re-arrangement of contigs in the region. AC188465.2 now has a green-ball join with re-arranged TPF component AC193792.4 which closes the gap.

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between accessions AC188462.2 and AC188456.2
issue.resolution_text: Gap has been closed due to re-arrangement of contigs in the region. AC188462.2 now flanks a gap that was previously occupied by AC188457.2 in MGSCv37

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between accessions AC188456.2 and AC188452.6
issue.resolution_text: Gap has been closed due to re-arrangement of contigs in the region. AC188456.2 now has a green-ball join with re-arranged TPF component AC188457.2 which closes the gap in MGSCv37.

issue.description: Reference Assembly gap between accessions AC193792.4 and AC188822.2
issue.resolution_text: Gap has been closed due to re-arrangement of contigs in the region. AC193792.4 now has a green-ball join with re-arranged TPF component AC188459.2 which closes the gap in MGSCv37 .

issue.description: Mouse Build 37 has WGS CAAA01104267.1 and CAAA01104270.1 spanning a gap between AC148989.4 and AC188461.4.
issue.resolution_text: AC188607.5/RP23-143D11 was sequenced and submitted 13-MAR-2007 to close a gap between AC148989.4 and AC188461.4 once spanned by WGS components CAAA01104267.1 and CAAA01104270.1.

issue.summary: AC168909.4 appears to be Redundant in Mouse Build 37

issue.resolution_text: AC168909.4 was removed from the TPF because it was redundant.

issue.summary: There are 4 WGS pieces extending into chromosome 7's telomere

issue.resolution_text: AC225443.3 (WI1-162P21) replaces WGS components CAAA01077986.1, CAAA01077995.1, CAAA01157674.1 and CAAA01077992.1.

issue.summary: There is a gap in the Reference between components AC221015.2 and AC172750.1
